title: Darkstream: violence, morality, and the Left
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight at 7 PM Eastern I’ll be doing a Darkstream in which we’ll be discussing the way in which the Left is not merely demanding legislated morality, but doing so in a violent manner.

Notice the anti-American battlecry: “”No borders, no nations, fuck deportations”

Our rhetoric is better: “You have to go home.”

UPDATE: The replay is here. 1,510 live viewers, that’s a new record. Not exactly Scott and Mike territory, but not bad either.
